definitions.title: adv. 1. interrog.
definitions.body: How? Ge 26:9, 2Sa 1:5, 2Sa 1:14, 1Ki 12:6, Is 20:6 al.; oft. with impf. (esp. in 1 ps.) in an expostulation Ge 39:9, Ge 44:8, Ge 44:34, Jos 9:7, 2Sa 2:22, 2Sa 12:18, Ps 137:4, Is 48:11 for howshould it be profaned ? ([[ו]])[[איך תאמר]] how canst or dost thou (do you) say…? Ju Jdg 16:15 Is 19:11 Je 2:23 (cf. Je 8:8 [[אֵיכָה]]) Je 48:14 Ps 11:1; in an indirect sentence 2Ki 17:28, Je 36:17, Ru 3:18.

definitions.title: 2. as an exclam.
definitions.body: How! whether of lamentation 2Sa 1:19, Je 2:21, Je 9:18, Mic 2:4; or of satisfaction Is 14:4, Is 14:12, Je 48:39, Je 51:41, Ob:Ob 5 al.; with intensive force = how gladly! Je 3:19, how terribly! Je 9:6 (but others render here ‘for how [else] should I do’? etc.)
